description: System default anesthesia modifiers for anesthesia charges.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANES_DEFAULT_MOD
columns.description: Returns a system default anesthesia modifier for this charge. This is derived from the charge's concurrency, providers, and settings found in the payor�with�standard anesthesia modifier settings�(I EAF 8161).
